text_preview: user manual sku : abx00080 description the arduino uno r4 minima is the first uno board to feature a 32 - bit microcontroller. it features a ra4m1 series microcontroller from renesas ( r7fa4m1ab3cfm # aa0 ), which embeds a 48 mhz arm cortex - m4 microprocessor. the uno r4 minima ' s memory is larger
